Process the information from an ASV abundance matrix to run DADA2 for single barcode

Source: R/assign_taxonomy.R
process_single_barcode.Rd

Process the information from an ASV abundance matrix to run DADA2 for single barcode

Usage

process_single_barcode(
  data_tables,
  temp_directory_path,
  output_directory_path,
  asv_abund_matrix,
  tryRC = FALSE,
  verbose = FALSE,
  multithread = FALSE,
  locus = barcode
)

Arguments

data_tables

The data tables containing the paths to read files, metadata, primer sequences

asv_abund_matrix

An abundance matrix containing amplified sequence variants

On this page
